channel.title: Use an item on an object?
channel.description:
help with items on objects
kk heres what i want
use bone key on a couldren and you get rune shards... you put the runeshards back in... you get bone shards put the bone sahrds back in... you get a bone dagger and stuff like that

item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Packet 192. You could easily work off of examples in that packet.

Here is a nice list of common packets you will be using on a 317:

http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,291645.0.html

item.title: Use an item on an object?
item.dc:creator: @hockeykid230 hockeykid230
item.description:
@hockeykid230 wrote:

ok i haven’t done this in a while but ill give it a try.
Open client.java and hit ctrl+f and search for itemused go down to the end of one and hit enter after its brackets and use something like this only edit the numbers that are already in there.

if((itemUsed == 4653 && useWith == 4703) || (itemUsed == 4703 && useWith == 4653) { sendMessage("insert message here."); deleteItem(4653, getItemSlot(4653), 1); deleteItem(4703, getItemSlot(4703), 1); addItem(3006, 1); }

Read full topic
